mapper.select: SELECT h.BUG_HISHORY_ID AS bugHistoryId, h.BUG_ID AS bugId, h.NEW_STATE AS newState, dic_new_state.DATA_NAME AS newStateName, h.OLD_STATE AS oldState, dic_old_state.DATA_NAME AS oldStateName, h.OPERATING_TIME AS operatingTime, h.OPERATOR_ID AS operatorId, operator.USER_NAME AS operatorName, h.SYSTEM_ID AS systemId, h.COMMENT AS comment, h.LAST_OPERATION_TIME AS lastOperationTime FROM tf_bug_history h LEFT JOIN t_sys_user operator ON h.OPERATOR_ID = operator.USER_ID LEFT JOIN data_dictionary dic_new_state ON dic_new_state.DATA_TYPE = 'bugState' AND dic_new_state.DATA_VALUE = h.NEW_STATE LEFT JOIN data_dictionary dic_old_state ON dic_old_state.DATA_TYPE = 'bugState' AND dic_old_state.DATA_VALUE = h.OLD_STATE WHERE h.BUG_ID = #{bugId} ORDER BY h.OPERATING_TIME DESC
